The researcher, the contestant, who is upset in his words, is up to the Almighty: And if the illusion or their weight is lost to people and what has been presented in the taking of people, and this is in giving, then the meaning is: They are shortened.It is also used with the mandate with the pain and its body; He came in the language about what was said: He has a meaning in the sense of him, and he made one other like him as a matter of deletion and communication on that the origin is like him, and he will be done.؎ And your gardens are lost, and I have forbidden you from the daughters of the elderly and their saying in the example: Al -Haris will hunt you, not the horse; That is: I gave you and hunting for you, and it is permissible for the words to be on the authority of the added, which is a mandate, a balanced, and the residence of the added is its place, and the origin: and if it is the same as the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who and those who are deleted for him, and they are a guarantor, a confirmation of the kind -hearted guarantee, which is the waw, and they were standing on the wow.Al -Zamakhshari said: It is not valid as the vowel of those who are guided by those who are guided because it is the meaning of it if they take from the people, and they will be fulfilled, and if they are, and if they are, and if they are.The specials are lost, and it is a contradictory words; Because the hadith is located in the verb, not in the preachers, and that is on what is in the revelation; Because the righteous affirmation is driven by the shrine, it is not intended to achieve that the whole is issued from them, not from their servants, for example, and the one who will be pushed to the Al -Fasih, then: They lose, so that the bearer is appointed to specialize, and the excuse appears in leaving the fulfillment, as the meaning does not lose except they are, and it is necessary for the contradiction.First in the same way, what is forbidden from this estimation is more forbidden and carried on the verge of the news from one of them, which is the part of the penalty, and we do not look for it, and it was said: It is a distress Impress the thousand after the waw.And it was decided in the science of the line after it in the same way as this and the drawing of the Misfa’f al -Utmani in his curricula and his shame is here Restore in the wandering as it is not hidden.Perhaps the restriction of the assignment in the image of the severity and the remembrance of the calamity and the weighing in the image of the brother Let them be able to make sure of the severity, and if they are given, and they adultery, and they will be able to enable them to be underestimated in the two of the two, and it is all, and the for their condition, I wanted with the first time with a proud.The sheikh of our Sheikhs said the master The dye of God in this way: that the softening in the whole is with a little bit that is not packed in the most unilateral without the slope in the weigh Many and also most of the most valuable, if the verse is informed that they do not remain on people, what is a few, insignificant from their rights The many who are not tolerated by the many people, but also the people Partial, as it is understood from the remembrance of the brotherhood in the whole, because it is not known from it that they lose them with the many things, too, but perhaps it is deluded Remembering that they do not delay their loss with the entire money of money, so it is imperative in the second slit of the remembrance of the brotherhood in the weigh Come on to them by giving them their conditions.I finish.It is followed that the question does not protect the question, because it is not said: “If they are abandoned on people, they will be fulfilled, and if they weighs them, they will be lost.” They are fulfilled and they are losing the vigor with the first part of the first way and be in the words of what is before Al -Zujaj said: The meaning: If they get from the people, they will be fulfilled by the whole, and if they are seized, they will be over, and they would not be removed, and it is not mentioned if they are the same for the sake And the sale is when it depends and weighs, and it is intended for what Al -Tayyibi stipulated that he took advantage of the remembrance of one of the two centuries from the other for the next of the village.It was said: The wrappers are sold, and they are often bought the many things, and then they sell it separately in the helicopters, and how many of them have seen from them who are from the one who is bought Many of the loves, for example, on one day, then he will be smoked, then he pledges it as something in the days I only said in the image of the severity, and when what they sold is different and a few and a few mentioned the cake and the weigh My opinion of those who buy from them a remembrance with that image, as some of them choose the
